 <h1 align="center">Hi 👋! I'm Eduardo, a Web Developer from Colombia</h1>

<div align="center">
  <h2>🚀 About Me</h2>
</div>

- 💻 **Developer**: Certified web developer specializing in React, Next.js, Firebase, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.
- ⚖️ **Lawyer**: Experienced attorney, currently expanding my expertise in the tech industry.
- 🏋️ **Athlete**: Competitive rugby player and powerlifter, applying discipline and resilience to everything I do.
- 🎮 **Gamer**: Avid gamer who enjoys FPS, competitive games, and exploring immersive RPGs.


<div align="center">
  <h2>🌟 What I'm Working On</h2>
</div>

- Developing innovative web applications with a focus on performance and user experience.
- Exploring advanced backend development using Node.js and GraphQL.

<div align="center">
  <h2>🤝 Let's Collaborate!</h2>
</div>

I'm looking to contribute to:
- Open-source projects.
- Scalable and creative web solutions.
